channel.title: Authentication on RBAC ATLAS
channel.description: Recent content in Authentication on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: authorino-operator
item.description:
Description

Kubernetes operator for managing Authorino instances, a K8s-native AuthN/AuthZ service to protect your APIs.

  • https://github.com/Kuadrant/authorino-operator/
  • https://github.com/Kuadrant/authorino/

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
authorino-operator default âŒ â€” 22 1 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ğŸ¤– authorino-operator

Namespace: default Â |Â  Automount: âŒ

ğŸ”‘ Permissions (22)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager core/configmaps create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical ConfigMapAccess DataExposure InformationDisclosure PotentialPrivilegeEscalation Tampering
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager apps/deployments create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical Persistence PotentialPrivilegeEscalation PrivilegeEscalation Tampering WorkloadLifecycle
Role authorino-operator-leader-election coordination.k8s.io/leases create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Critical ControlPlaneDisruption CriticalNamespace DenialOfService Tampering
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager core/secrets get Â· list Â· watch Critical ClusterWideSecretAccess CredentialAccess DataExposure InformationDisclosure SecretAccess
Role authorino-operator-leader-election core/configmaps create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch High ConfigMapAccess DataExposure InformationDisclosure PotentialPrivilegeEscalation Tampering
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager rbac.authorization.k8s.io/clusterrolebindings create Â· get Â· list Â· update Â· watch Medium InformationDisclosure RBACQuery Reconnaissance
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager rbac.authorization.k8s.io/clusterroles create Â· get Â· list Â· update Â· watch Medium InformationDisclosure RBACQuery Reconnaissance
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager rbac.authorization.k8s.io/rolebindings create Â· get Â· list Â· update Â· watch Medium InformationDisclosure RBACQuery Reconnaissance
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager rbac.authorization.k8s.io/roles create Â· get Â· list Â· update Â· watch Medium InformationDisclosure RBACQuery Reconnaissance
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager authorization.k8s.io/subjectaccessreviews create Medium InformationDisclosure RBACQuery
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager authentication.k8s.io/tokenreviews create Medium CredentialAccess InformationDisclosure RBACQuery
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager authorino.kuadrant.io/authconfigs create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager authorino.kuadrant.io/authconfigs/status get Â· patch Â· update Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager operator.authorino.kuadrant.io/authorinos create Â· delete Â· get Â· list Â· patch Â· update Â· watch Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager operator.authorino.kuadrant.io/authorinos/finalizers update Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager operator.authorino.kuadrant.io/authorinos/status get Â· patch Â· update Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager core/configmaps/status delete Â· get Â· patch Â· update Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager core/events create Â· patch Low
Role authorino-operator-leader-election core/events create Â· patch Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager coordination.k8s.io/leases create Â· get Â· list Â· update Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager core/serviceaccounts create Â· get Â· list Â· update Â· watch Low
ClusterRole authorino-operator-manager core/services create Â· get Â· list Â· update Â· watch Low
